pros: SCAD HK  has an amazing campus like all the SCAD campuses. The small class sizes allow you to really get to know your students and have great one-on-one interactions on a regular basis.
cons: Because of the small campus size professors regularly have to take on more work and cover a much wider range of subjects than at other institutions. This can many times lead to burn-out and frustration.
